title: QA Specialist
description: Are you someone who loves to make computers do your work for you? Do you enjoy working on a diverse set of projects with a diverse group of people? Do you value professional growth and continuous self improvement? If so, Smashing Boxes is looking for an experienced QA Specialist who has a knack for problem solving, a love for bleeding-edge technology, and a strong desire to work smarter not harder. If you live to solve the mysteries of the world, while researching ways to make your job easier, we have a place for you!
responsibilities:
• Author and execute test plans with a mindset of automate first, manual test last
  • Work with backend developers to expand their automated test suites
  • Adhere to core testing principles set by team and group leadership
  • Record and document results and compare to expected results
  • Develop and document application test plans based on software requirements and technical specifications
  • Document anomalies and issues in solid bug reports
  • Participate in application planning meetings
  • Ensure data integrity standards
lookingFor:
We have a few core requirements, they are:

  • A strong understanding of software testing methodologies
  • Firm grasp of the software development life cycle, technical requirements, and project management
  • Prior automation, software testing, or programming experience
  • Experience working in an Agile environment
  • Strong eye for detail and ability to quickly define defects
  • Must also have the ability to work collaboratively with others as part of a team
  • Exceptional communication and organizational abilities

And if you can check these boxes as well, we'll order you a whole pizza on your first day. Yep, just for you:

  • Mobile development automation experience is awesome!
  • Previous agency experience is awesome!
  • Appium knowledge is super awesome!
